document.full_text: oppenheimer & co cut its rating on staples inc  and officemax inc  to "perform" from "outperform," saying sales trends for office supplies retailers appear unlikely to rebound any time soon.
document.title: oppenheimer cuts ratings on staples, officemax
lines_and_colors: oppenheimer & co cut its rating on staples inc  and officemax inc  to "perform" from "outperform," saying sales trends for office supplies retailers appear unlikely to rebound any time soon.
